##########################################
Welcome to Nereid Webshop's documentation!
##########################################

This package provides a full webshop based on Tryton Nereid.
It consists of a Tryton module providing the webshop business logic
and the required HTML templates
as well as an example Nereid/Flask application for serving the webshop.

   :maxdepth: 2

   installation
